  name='ABQ_Data_Entry',
  version='1.0',
  author='Alan D Moore',
  author_email='alandmoore@example.com',

)

import sys
if getattr(sys, 'frozen', False):
  IMAGE_DIRECTORY = Path(sys.executable).parent / 'images'
else:
  IMAGE_DIRECTORY = Path(__file__).parent / 'images'
